title: Waist-to-height ratio is a better predictor of hypertension in women during recovery from anesthesia compared to BMI, waist-to-hip ratio, and waist circumference
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Qinqin Cao, Chengjuan Fan, Yufen Fei, Shouxin Zhang, Tong Shen, Haihong Meng
